resources.string: It seems that your device does not have a Bluetooth adapter. You cannot connect to a robot.
Your device does not have the Bluetooth LE feature. You cannot connect to the robot.
The android version of your device is not supported to connect to a robot.
The connection to a robot needs the location service on your device. Do you want to open the system settings to allow this?
Type your new URL for the Open Roberta Lab. Recommended: http://ip:port
Open Roberta Mobile is developed to make the use of the Open Roberta Lab as easy as possible. This version supports generating and executing programs for WeDo 2.0.
Roberta Mobile is an open-source programming platform developed by Fraunhofer IAIS within the initiative »Roberta – Learning with Robots«
Open Roberta Mobile requires to be connected to a wifi networ, please restart this app after you have made a connection.
